author: thomreis
body:
#### PR description:

Fixes heap buffer overflows reported by ASAN (Issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/44275).
In addition also fix a copy and paste mistake where the EB conditions were used instead of the EE ones for gain 6 sample correlations.

#### PR validation:

Passes 12834.412 in CMSSW_14_1_ASAN_X_2024-02-28-2300.

Backport of #44301
title: ECAL - Fix heap-buffer overflows reported by ASAN - 140x
